description: Outdated Apache version with known RCE
remediation: Upgrade Apache to latest stable and apply vendor patches

description: Writable service leading to remote code execution (Samba)
remediation: Apply Samba patch; restrict shares and permissions

description: FTP without TLS — credentials may be transmitted in cleartext
remediation: Use SFTP/FTPS or disable FTP and enforce secure alternatives

description: MySQL accessible from network — weak authentication policies possible
remediation: Bind MySQL to localhost or firewall the port; enforce strong passwords
